casebody.data:
SAMUELS v. E. F. DREW & CO., Inc. LEVER BROTHERS CO. v. LOWENTHAL. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 24, 1922.) No. 64. See, also, 284 Fed. 1021. Larkin, Sathbone & Perry, of New York City (Donald (X Muhleman and Henry E. Kelley, both of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner appellant.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
